segments.text: I'm afraid we can't increase salary this year , money is just too tight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . I can't agree , dan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Surely , there are other ways to save money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you talking about , we've tried everything !
segments.speaker: S1
